feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapter and additional development tools for Apache Geronimo.
feature.name: Geronimo v1.0 Server Adapter

feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapters and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v2.0, v2.1 and v2.2 servers.
feature.name: Geronimo v2.2 Server Adapter

feature.description: This feature provides core support required for the WTP Server Adapter for specific versions of the Apache Geronimo server.
feature.name: Geronimo Core Feature

feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapters and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v1.1, v2.0, v2.1, v2.2, and v3.0 servers.
feature.name: Geronimo v3.0 Server Adapter

feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapter and additional development tools for Apache Geronimo.
feature.name: Geronimo v1.1.x Server Adapter

feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapters and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v2.0 and v2.1 servers.
feature.name: Geronimo v2.1 Server Adapter

feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapter and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v2.0 server.
feature.name: Geronimo v2.0 Server Adapter
